nodes.text: Director of Investigation was a title held by the leader of the Galactic Republic Judicial Department's Office of Criminal Investigations. During the time of the Clone Wars between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the title was held by Foga Brill.

The title of Director of Investigation was first used in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The Director of Investigation was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in "Byss and the Deep Core, Part 3: Prakith," a 2005 online supplement written by Rodney Thompson for the Byss and the Deep Core article series produced by Wizards of the Coast.
